positions.title: IT System Administrator
positions.company: Valmet Automotive Holding GmbH & Co. KG

summary.headline: Fullstack developer experienced in:
experience: Agile project teams and software projects (e.g. Lidl DE)
bring: 4+ years of software development in corporate environments
Strong understanding of clean code, architecture and user-centric design
Team-oriented, clear communicator, reliable working style
focus: Deepening modern web stack & fullstack engineering
Building and hosting my own projects for hands-on learning
summary.open: Open to new opportunities in web development / application engineering.

sport.title: Sports
sport.content: I regularly do strength and endurance training and enjoy long walks.
sport.target: Goals: Documenting my progress and improving wherever possible.
sport.functionalities: Why: I value my mental and physical health.
sport.stack: Favorites: Vineyard runs, high-volume strength workouts, small-field football, etc.

woods.title: Woodwork
woods.content: Growing up working together in the local forest to prepare wood for winter heating has shaped me deeply.
woods.target: Goal: Working together made the process faster and more enjoyable.
woods.functionalities: Useful: I learned a lot about work, value and responsibility. Woodwork warms you twice: while working and while heating.
woods.stack: Tools: Own chainsaw with full equipment, certification, etc.

diy.title: DIY
diy.content: I enjoy fixing things around the house and love hands-on work.
diy.target: Goal: Things break — it happens. Moving away from a throwaway culture toward recycling and upcycling.
diy.functionalities: Useful: Sustainability and technical curiosity have motivated me since childhood.
diy.stack: I use AI, written guides and YouTube tutorials to repair things. If something is too risky, I seek professional help.

adventure.title: Action & Adventure
adventure.content: I love adventures like skydiving or cliff jumping – adrenaline is my friend!
adventure.target: Goals: Stepping outside my comfort zone.
adventure.functionalities: By doing so, I continually rediscover my limits. This helps me reflect and motivates me to set new goals.
adventure.stack: A base level of athleticism and curiosity for the unknown pushes me to try new things.

monteur.title: Monteur Rooms Nedic
monteur.description: A project offering worker accommodations with modern equipment and simple booking options.
monteur.target: Target group: Construction companies, workers, students
monteur.functionalities: Features: Booking form, media library, easy contact options

dgv.title: Digital Business Card
dgv.description: A digital business card for modern networking – fast, stylish and smart.
dgv.functionalities: Features: Contact entry, company selection, browser preview, scan-to-phone

portal.title:
In development: 
App Manager
portal.description: An application portal that centrally manages an app pool, allowing values to be created, read, updated and deleted.

chogan.title:
Planned: 
PWA, native, AI...
chogan.description: My goal is to work intensively with future-oriented technologies to build innovative digital solutions.
chogan.target: Target group: Future clients and interested users
chogan.functionalities: Features: Offline capabilities, GPT integrations, system component integration, data analysis, etc.
chogan.stack: Interesting technologies include: Service Worker & Web App Manifest, OpenAI & Anthropic, JavaScript distributions & Python, etc.
